channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Tombliboo Ooo Drinks Everybody Else's Pinky Ponk Juice. Children's programme. Everyone enjoys a ride on the Pinky Ponk, but Ooo is more interested in drinking Pinky Ponk juice.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Eddie Redmayne - If I Had a Dinosaur. A story read by a special guest. Eddie Redmayne reads a story about a little girl who wonders which animal would make the best pet.
